meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7809.

td.p: Michelle Mueckler, a stay-at-home mom from Elgin, South Carolina
Justin Moody, a paralegal from Durham, North Carolina
Ryan Fenster, a banker from SeaTac, Washington (whose 6-day cash winnings total $127,397)

tr.td: WORD PUZZLES
AUTOBIOGRAPHICAL NOVELS
TRAIL MIX
CLASSIC SONGS' FIRST LINES
I READ THE NEWS TODAY
O'BOY

"You\'ve Lost That Lovin\' Feelin\'"

Ryan
Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
